answers.answer: Hi there,Losing weight in type 2 diabetes can have a great impact since it can reduce the morbidity rates and the chances of developing complications. You should take a diet which helps in keeping your blood glucose levels as normal as possible It is best to talk to your doctor about an exercise and diet program that best fits your needs. You need to consult your doctor, a nutrition expert/dietician and a physical trainer regarding this. Take care!

question: Hi im trying to loose weight, I got sick 3-4 years ago with carbón monoxide poisining,, and at the time i weighed 360, now I weigh 286,I am a Type 2 diabetic, Have sleep apnea, asthma,,am on thyroid meds, and blood pressure meds, I want to loose more weight,But it seems, like im not succeding,can you help
title: help
